A patch release of [http://code.google.com/p/iring-tools/wiki/ReleaseNotice_204 iRINGTools 2.0] that includes bug fixes.  

The download is available [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-2.0.5.zip here].  
The SDK can be downloaded from [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-SDK-2.0.4.zip here]

== New Features ==
 * Improved dotNetRDF endpoints
 * Improved QMXF Generator and Transforms.
== Bugs Fixed ==
 * Related Item URIs have been fixed to maintain compatibility.
 * Repositories.xml was old.
